content: As an AI language model, I don't have a subjective opinion but I can say that trends tend to be cyclical, so it's possible that the renewed interest in 80s music and aesthetics may continue for some time. Factors that may influence this could include the influence of social media and the Internet in spreading and prolonging trends, nostalgia for a perceived simpler time, and the popularity of 80s-inspired media such as the Netflix series Stranger Things. On the other hand, the trend may also die out if people tire of it or move on to other interests.
